holidays.description: Let’s explore the meaning, history, and significance of this Scottish holiday!

holidays.title: Harbin Ice Festival
holidays.description: During the Harbin Ice Festival, we take a trip to "Arendelle", just like "Frozen."

holidays.title: National Bird Day
holidays.description: While birds are amazing, they are also a species under particular threat.

holidays.title: National Day of Dialogue
holidays.description: Let’s have difficult conversations with compassion and understanding, making the world a better place.

holidays.title: National Ellen Day
holidays.description: No matter where you live or what you do, if you’re Ellen, we’re celebrating you.

holidays.title: National Screenwriters Day
holidays.description: Every dialogue you love is written by a dedicated screenwriter — let’s honor their talents today.

holidays.title: National Thank God Its Monday Day
holidays.description: Rewire your minds to be positive about the most hated day of the week.

holidays.title: National Whipped Cream Day
holidays.description: Whipped cream is a sweet treat that we've been creating for centuries.

holidays.title: Twelfth Night
holidays.description: Is it wise to take your decorations down or keep them up on the Twelfth Night?

holidays.title: Bradley Cooper’s Birthday
holidays.description: It seems like there’s nothing this award-winning actor, director, and producer can’t do. He’s the man!

holidays.title: Diane Keaton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This one-of-a-kind actress has appeared in numerous films and is well-known for her distinct personality.

holidays.title: Hayao Miyazaki’s Birthday
holidays.description: This well-known director has been honored with dozens of awards — in Japan and worldwide.
